content.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
content.transliteration: Qaaaf; wal Qur aanil Majeed

translations.en.ahmedraza: Qaf; by oath of the Glorious Qur’an.
translations.en.arberry: Qaf. By the glorious Koran!
translations.en.asad: Qaf. CONSIDER this sublime Qur’an!
translations.en.daryabadi: Qaf. By the Qur'an glorious, We have sent thee as a warner.
translations.en.hilali: Qaf. [These letters (Qaf, etc.) are one of the miracles of the Quran, and none but Allah (Alone) knows their meanings]. By the Glorious Quran.
translations.en.pickthall: Qaf. By the Glorious Qur'an,
translations.en.qaribullah: Qaaf. By the Glorious Koran!
translations.en.sahih: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...
translations.en.sarwar: By Qaf and the glorious Quran, (you are the Messenger of God).
translations.en.yusufali: Qaf: By the Glorious Qur'an (Thou art Allah's Messenger).
translations.en.maududi: Qaf. By the glorious Qur'an.
translations.en.shakir: Qaf. I swear by the glorious Quran (that Muhammad is the Apostle of Allah)
translations.en.itani: Qaf. By the Glorious Quran.
